it.polimi.ingsw.model.map

Class AmmoPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.map.Square
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.map.AmmoPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AmmoPoint
extends Square
    This class represent a square that is not a spawnPoint and with AmmoTile on it
    See Also:
